entries.title: Stephen Colbert Gets New CBS Late-Night Gig In Primetime With ‘Elsbeth’ Role
entries.content: How is this for an ironic twist — as Stephen Colbert is preparing to say goodbye as the host of CBS’ The Late Show, he also is portraying a late-night host for CBS with a guest role on the upcoming third season of the network’s crime anthology Elsbeth, Deadline has confirmed.
